channel.title: üè¢ Tongyi Lab on HF Daily Paper Reviews by AI
channel.description: Recent content in üè¢ Tongyi Lab on HF Daily Paper Reviews by AI

item.title: Debate Helps Weak-to-Strong Generalization
item.description: Debate-enhanced weak supervision boosts AI alignment by combining strong and weak models, enabling safer and more reliable AI systems.

item.title: ChatDiT: A Training-Free Baseline for Task-Agnostic Free-Form Chatting with Diffusion Transformers
item.description: ChatDiT enables zero-shot, multi-turn image generation using pretrained diffusion transformers and a novel multi-agent framework.

item.title: IOPO: Empowering LLMs with Complex Instruction Following via Input-Output Preference Optimization
item.description: IOPO empowers LLMs to master complex instructions via input-output preference optimization, boasting significant performance gains on a new benchmark, TRACE.

item.title: In-Context LoRA for Diffusion Transformers
item.description: In-Context LoRA empowers existing text-to-image models for high-fidelity multi-image generation by simply concatenating images and using minimal task-specific LoRA tuning.
